sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

sentences.english: Their job is to make or confirm reservations.
sentences.chinese: 他們的工作就是爲旅客定票。

sentences.english: They wrangled and rowed with other passengers.
sentences.chinese: 他們與其他旅客爭辨吵鬧。

sentences.english: I bedded the traveller for a night.
sentences.chinese: 我爲這位旅客提供一夜住宿。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的支持讓航空公司拓展到貨物和旅客的服務。

sentences.english: Yes, Passport and the disembarkation card, please.
sentences.chinese: 是的，請給我護照，以及旅客入境登記表。
旅客付了直到拉尼的車費。

sentences.english: Passengers must go to the waiting lounge before boarding a flight.
sentences.chinese: 登機前，旅客必須先到候機室候機。

sentences.english: This is the third time the tourists squawked about the service of the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 這是旅客們第三次對飯店的服務發牢騷了。

sentences.english: The proposed model of our country's railway management system reform is "Separation of infrastructure from operation".
sentences.chinese: 提出了網運分離條件下旅客列車運行線管理的含義。

sentences.english: The boat ferried passengers across the bay.
Objective To find out the cause of food-poisoning on a passenger train .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解旅客列車上發生食物中毒的原因。

sentences.english: Marylebone Station was packed with homeward- bound commuters.
sentences.chinese: 馬裏列本火車站擠滿了要回家去的旅客。

sentences.english: The passengers turned quite green with sea- sickness .
sentences.chinese: 旅客們由於暈船而臉色發青。

sentences.english: Seven in 10 frequent business travelers are now carrying smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 如今，有70%的商務常旅客都會攜帶智能電話。

sentences.english: Travelers from SARS hot ots are being isolated for 10 days.
sentences.chinese: 從沙士疫區前來的旅客將被隔離十天。

definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
(increased) passenger transportation around Chinese New Year
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
